tool_description: ValiX API is a versatile tool for data validation and analysis. It offers three unique functionalities: Email Validation, Credit Card Validation, and IP Address Validation. Use this API to ensure the integrity and correctness of various data types in your applications.
name: ValiX - Data Validator API
title: ValiX - Data Validator API

api_list.name: Validate IP Address (POST)
api_list.description: Validates the format of an IP address (IPv4 or IPv6), provides geolocation information, and accepts input as a JSON payload.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://valix-data-validator-api.p.rapidapi.com/ip/post"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "valix-data-validator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Validate Credit Card Number (POST)
api_list.description: Validates the format and existence of a credit card number and determines its type using a JSON payload.

api_list.name: Validate Email Address (POST)
